description:
Kropki 8 is an abstract strategy game, played by two or more people. The game is superficially similar to Go, in that the goal is to "capture" enemy dots by surrounding them with a continuous line of one's own dots. Once an area containing enemy dots is surrounded, that area ceases to be playable.

- Choose scoring system: occupy territory vs. capture enemy dots
- Different time modes for different play tempo (from 5 sec per move to 30 mins total)
- Multiple color themes (for both day and night times)
- Up to 8 players support
- Ambient soundtrack for intense mind battles
name: Kropki 8
